#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
  int t;
  cin>>t;
  int done=0;
 loop:
  done++;
  int n;
  cin>>n;
  int sumline[n];
  int sumrow[n];
  for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
    sumrow[i]=sumline[i]=0;
  for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
      for(int j=0;j<n;j++)
	{
	  int x;
	  cin>>x;
	  sumline[i]+=x;
	  sumrow[j]+=x;
	}
    }
  bool isOk=true;
  for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
      if(sumline[i]%2==1)
	{
	  //cerr<<"OK=false from:"<<i<<" : "<<sumline[i]<<endl;
	isOk=false;
	}
      if(sumrow[i]%2==1)
	isOk=false;
    }
  if(isOk)
    cout<<"1"<<endl;
  else
    {
      int countline=0,countrow=0,lastline=-1,lastrow=-1;
      for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
	  if(sumline[i]%2==1)
	    {
	      countline++;
	      lastline=i;
	    }
	  if(sumrow[i]%2==1)
	    {
	      countrow++;
	      lastrow=i;
	    }
	}
      if(countrow==1&&countline==1)
	cout<<"("<<lastline+1<<","<<lastrow+1<<")"<<endl;
      else
	cout<<"0"<<endl;
    }
  if(done<t)
    goto loop;
  return 0;
}
